response.overview: The protagonist of the film, Robert Berisha (I.Rexhepi), an Albanian-American, a well-known businessman from America, returns to live and invest in Kosovo. When Robert and his company start building a textile factory, everything will change in his life. A gang favored by Beka (E.Petrovci) will suddenly kidnap his daughter and demand a million euros for her head. After the intervention of the police, the arrest of the perpetrators of this crime is achieved and then the successful completion of investments in Kosovo can be continued.
response.title: Milion Euro
